TextLibrary.Text: It seems every Megacorp is after us except Cytech.
It seems every Megacorp is after us except Cytech.
The longer we delay, the stronger my children will grow.
The longer we delay, the stronger my children will grow.
Then we take one last chance with Cytech. After that, it'll be up to us alone. Set a course for the Fornax System.
Then we take one last chance with Cytech. After that, it'll be up to us alone. Set a course for the Fornax System.
